text: Jacques Limouzy (29 August 1926 â€“ 7 November 2021) was a French politician from Castres. Limouzy was first elected to the National Assembly in 1967. Limouzy lost the 1969 legislative elections. He was deputy again from 1975 to 1981, and between 1986 and 2002. Limouzy died on 7 November 2021, aged 95.Jacques Limouzy est mort ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Politicians from Occitanie Category:People from Tarn
